pages.title: Bonus
pages.text: Thank you for playing Beyond Earth!$(br2)This mod is currently a work in progress and has many new and exciting features planned!$(br)Feel free to check the CurseForge or Modrinth page to see what new updates are coming out.

Many people have collaborated together to build this mod:$(li)Guide Book Writer: Kraaven$()$(li)Forge Dev: MrScautHD$()$(li)Forge Dev: ExistingEevee$()$(li)Fabric Dev: Alex Nijjar$()$(li)Sound Artist: Mvbz$()$(li)Texturer: FritzHackenstien$()$(li)Texturer: Fizz$()$(li)Texturer: SeagullBoi$()$(li)Texturer: Jopken$()$(li)Texturer: Lego245$()$(li)Modeler: Scarecrow$()$(li)Modeler: ShreksRightT***e1$()$(li)Builder: Barracuda,Solar$()$(li)Builder: Spacestar$()$(li)Builder: Cheche√±o$()$(li)Builder: Rer0$()
